Title: Ditch Day
Writer: Craig DiGregorio, Blake Anderson (created by), Adam Devine (created by), Anders Holm (created by), Kyle Newacheck (created by), Connor Pritchard (created by), Dominic Russo (created by), Scotty Landes (story editor)
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam Devine, Anders Holm, Jillian Bell
Plot: After agreeing to hand off a mysterious package for Karl, the guys stage an office-wide ditch day so that they can stay home and make the deal.
